review: Had a friend highly recommend this to me so bought it on that recommendation. I can't compare it to the larger boxes as I haven't owned those, but it's lightning fast to stream compared to things like the Wii or a Blu Ray player. Easy to get your money's worth with just Netflix and Prime.
author: Brian Murphy

review: Wow best choice yet! Better than ever expected. Great shows, great movies, great experience. Thank you Amazon
author: Richard W. Relyea

review: The product do look good on the surface, but once I've installed onto my TV and start to use.Then I realize it's not that kind of stuff I'm looking forward into it.Almost all the movies or TV programs need to subscribe (pay $) to view.I uninstalled it, and now looking how to return this TV stick which is useless to me.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Excellent value if you have Prime. Easy to set up and use. Well worth the money for the convenience when connecting to movies with the stick instead of using your computer.
author: D. Murphy

review: I love the Fire TV Stick. My old blu-ray player wouldn't stream very well anymore, so I decided to try this. Setup was simple and quick and I have no complaints about the performance. The only reason I didn't give five stars is because the print is a little hard to read from a normal viewing location. It doesn't hinder what I need often, but I occasionally have to get up to read something on the menu.
author: Melody Cooper

review: Amazing.  Plug and play. Easy to set up.  Wow!

review: The fire TV Stick is just what I needed for viewing movies without cable premium channels. Excellent choice
